text: Mannar District ( ; ) is one of the 25 districts of Sri Lanka. Districts are the second-level administrative divisions of the country. The capital of the district is the town of Mannar. ==Geography== Mannar District is in the north west of Sri Lanka. It is part of the Northern Province. It has an area of . ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Districts of Sri Lanka Category:Northern Province, Sri Lanka
title: Mannar District
